title: Collaborative Clinical and Dental Photography Education Program (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical/dental knowledge and understanding of basic smartphone camera usage
context.additional_context: Learners collaborate on projects based on real clinical cases, with a focus on acquiring smartphone-based photography skills.

learning_goals: Learners can implement five standard shooting compositions for dental treatment areas under clinical lighting conditions
Learners can produce results meeting over 80% of diagnostic validity criteria (resolution, focus, lighting) using smartphone cameras for clinical photography
Learners can design clinical photography protocols through PBL team activities and revise/improve them at least twice based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
